pros: Popular for help with skin issues, like adult acne, and to speed up healing from colds
cons: Causes nausea in some, especially if not taken with food
May be because of higher zinc content

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure that this is a Nature Made Product
customer_reviews.text: It says that packaging may vary, but I got square bottles with labels that looked like they were printed in a computer instead of coming from a manufacturer. I am a little nervous that these are not what I thought I bought. They do not look like any in-store purchased Nature Made product.
customer_reviews.author: Dani-gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Started taking because I was not tasting much of my food. Read this is common as you get ... mature☺. Then read taking zinc could help and it does. 30 mg pill seems to work best for me. Could get upset stomach if you take too much. Pretty cheap fix to improve quality of life.
customer_reviews.author: Tweeteepie

customer_reviews.title: It's good but the dosage is low . . .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my zinc supplement before I found out how to test for low zinc. After testing I decided I wanted a higher dosage so I bought a different brand. But this one is good it's just that it's only 30 milligram so I'd have to take at least 3 at a time & I wanted one I wouldn't have to take so many. I bought a higher dosage but this one is good, I recommend if it's the right dose for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Steedley

customer_reviews.title: GOOD EFFECTIVE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a family member who has Hypothyroidism, and this supplement is working well to optimize her thyroid medicine.

customer_reviews.title: Superior Zinc
customer_reviews.text: These are 30 mg so getting a lot for each capsule. Gel capsule is easy to swallow. It helps your immune system and that is a really good thing. Will order again once it is back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure and works well
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for several weeks and have not been sick even when my daughter had a cold. Highly recommend and will continue to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With This Size Zinc Capsule And The Fact It Is Manufactured By A Long Trusted Company
customer_reviews.text: Nature's Way has always been the top manufacturer I trust for health supplements and when I needed to get some zinc capsules I found they had the 30 mg size which is perfect for me. I take a lot of supplements to hopefully help keep my immunity system at it's peak and Nature's Way has been around for many years and they have earned my trust in the 30 plus years I have been using their products. This 30 mg capsule is easy to swallow and taking just one a day is all that I need under normal circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: PawPawRon

customer_reviews.title: Capsules bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking Zinc pills about 1/3 of the size of these capsules. I was disappointed that the pictures shown at top included an indication of the capsule size. Had I seen that, I'd probably have gone w/ another brand. At my age, pill boxes can get crowded.
customer_reviews.author: W. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: they are in capsule form, no terrible zinc taste!
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great find. Most people don’t like the taste of zinc and these are small white zinc capsules so there is no taste. Also I like that they can be taken with or without food and they were a very good value.

customer_reviews.title: Great for cell devepment!

I strongly recommend it for that. Look up the benefits online!

customer_reviews.title: Not doing much
customer_reviews.text: I started with 1 capsule with meals and slowly went up to 6 capsules per day. I might be sleeping better, but not sure. I lowered the dosage to 3 capsules per day and not experiencing anything better. I was hoping for better sleep or better gains in my workouts, but nothing.

customer_reviews.title: Nature's Way Zinc to beat flu!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a continuous buyer of Nature's Way products. I hope the makers continue their good reputation for many years to come. I take one cap three times a week, year around; I increase to one daily in fall and winter. Last year I got sick once only, at the end of the year, but it wasn't anything bad with fever or bed ridding, just a cold at the moment of sudden change from hot to cold temperatures.

product_meta.title: Nature's Way Zinc, 30 mg per serving (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: Zinc supports overall health and is present in all tissues, organs, and secretions of the body.* It is provided in an advanced chelate complex for optimal absorption. Our Zinc is carefully tested and produced to superior quality standards.
feature_bullets: Zinc is essential for cellular reproduction and is present in all tissues, organs and secretions of the body
It is provided in an advanced chelate complex for optimal absorption.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
